snippet.title: Colorfiction 's Becalm - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Becalm is a 5 minute relaxing sailing trip through magical waters for Windows, Mac and Linux. Let go of your worries, enjoy the voyage and, be calm!

Play now on:
https://colorfiction.itch.io/becalm

Stay up with updates on:
https://twitter.com/colorfiction

Music, Visuals and Editing: Colorfiction
